name: STEALTHY CATS: THE DANGEROUS ADVENTURE
description:
|||STEALTHY CATS||| A DANGEROUS ADVENTURE

by Pius Olver, October 2, 2021, using Unity

Top-Down stealth game with 20 levels! Sneak or fight around dogs to eat all the mice and progress to the next level. Get "DOG GENOCIDE" or "DOG SAVIOUR" achievements to collect all the CATS!

CONTROLS

Move with "WASD" or "ARROW KEYS"

Attack with "SPACE BAR" or "Left Mouse Click"

Tips

Eat mice to regain max health!

Surprise attack on a dog does extra damage!
